subject: Football
lead_paragraph: It was 71 degrees and dry, without a hint of a breeze, as Mike Nugent lined up for the kick. The conditions would have been perfect except for the door frame and back wall that compressed Nugent’s approach to a single step.
snippet: It was 71 degrees and dry, without a hint of a breeze, as Mike Nugent lined up for the kick. The conditions would have been perfect except for the door frame and back wall that compressed Nugent’s approach to a single step.
